definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential

sentences.english: Several researchers are already working on creating transposons lacking the capacity to make their own transposase.
sentences.chinese: 有些研究人员正在创造不能制造转位酵素的转位子。

sentences.english: In particular, they tracked the positions of transposable elements.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是，他们跟踪了转位因子的位置。

sentences.english: Well,that'd be what's called a chord inversion.
The second inversion of a triad has the original top note at the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 三和弦第二转位是将原最上面的音置于底部。

sentences.english: This mechanism may be designed with less location -rotating time (i. e small motion coefficient) and higher production ratio.
sentences.chinese: 另外这种机构还具有缩短转位时间的特性。

sentences.english: An indexing mechanism moves the tape between the supply and waste compartments.
sentences.chinese: 转位机构在供应和废物隔室之间运动条带。

sentences.english: Intervals may be inverted when the upper note is placed below the original lower note.
sentences.chinese: 把高音放置在原低音下时需要将音程转位。

sentences.english: Transposition was not protective in this analysis.
sentences.chinese: 本研究中发现转位并没有保护作用。

sentences.english: One patient who had undergone transposition developed chronic motor and sensory denervation.
sentences.chinese: 转位组有一个病人发展成慢性运动感觉丧失。

sentences.english: All links must be indexable by Google.
sentences.chinese: 所有的链接必须可转位的谷歌。
七音和弦的第一转位用65来表示。

sentences.english: The method of optimal intelligent design of NC indexable turning tools is discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 着重讨论数控可转位车刀智能化设计的方法。

sentences.english: The pathological findings in 9 cases of congenital situs in versus visoerum are reported.
sentences.chinese: 报道9例先天性内脏转位的病理发现。

sentences.english: The first inversion of a triad has the original third at the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 三和弦第一转位是将原第三音置于底部。

sentences.english: By the analysis of forces, the design principle for indexable drills for shallow holes is put forward.
sentences.chinese: 通过对力的分析，提出了可转位浅孔钻的设计原则。

sentences.english: A turnable structure matched with index bit (named index spacer) has been designed.
sentences.chinese: 本文设计和计算了一种可转位刀垫的结构。

definition: a note on a musical scale
triad/musical chord of three notes, such as major triad do-mi-so
(music) accidental (symbol such as a sharp (♯), flat (♭), natural (♮) etc)
tonic triad/triad of the home key
names of the notes of a musical scale (e.g. C, D, E or do, re, mi)
